description: Try our easy to follow Crunchy PERi-PERi Chicken & Pickled Onion Sliders  recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Crunchy PERi-PERi Chicken & Pickled Onion Sliders Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 25g Nando’s PERi-PERi Lemon & Herb Rub packet
1 baby gem lettuce, leaves separated, halved

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°Cfan-forced. Place a large bakingtray in oven.
Combine onion, sugar, vinegar, saltand 1 tbs water in a medium bowl.Set aside for 15 minutes. Drain.

Meanwhile, combine Nando's PERi-PERi crumb and herb rub in a shallow bowl. Whisk egg and 1 tbs water in a separate shallow bowl. Dip chicken in egg to coat, then coat in crumb mixture and place on a large plate. Spray hot baking tray with oil and place chicken on tray. Spray chicken with oil. Bake for 15 minutes, turning halfway, or until cooked through. Halve chicken.
Spread brioche bases with a littlePERinaise. Top with lettuce, chickenand onion. Drizzle with remainingPERinaise. Sandwich with tops. Serve.
